frontpage.title: Your Gateway to earn (mucho) Profits
frontpage.description: Our mission is to empower you to grow your wealth through secure and profitable investments. With Mucho Vault, you can deposit your tokens, and we'll take care of the rest, maximizing your earnings.
frontpage.Earn USDC, WETH or WBTC with no Imperman: Earn USDC, WETH or WBTC with no Impermanent Loss

v2.HeroText: (mucho) Vaults V2 will automatically invest your deposits in different protocols, allowing you to earn interests. Integration with other protocols is programmatic and decentralized, so nobody will own your tokens but you.
v2.aprNote: The total APR displayed is the sum of the vault APR itself + Bonus APR from your subscription plan.
v2.noNftNote: You do not have a subscription plan! Get one and boost your APR up to +10%.
v2.NftHero: Become a protocol "partner" and earn profit from total TVL by owning one of our NFT Susbcription Plans. Profits are rewarded on weekly basis.
v2.Annual Expected Yield for NFT Holders: Annual Expected Yield for NFT Holders
v2.Your expected annual NFT Bonus Yield: Your expected annual NFT Bonus Yield
v2.CompoundNote: *You will be asked to sign 3 transactions, to harvest your rewards and deposit them on WETH vault

badge.HeroText: Subscribe to your plan, and you will receive a NFT token that will identify you with benefits in our protocols!

swap.hero: Swap your tokens between different blockchains.

airdrop.hero: (mucho) Airdrop will automatically farm airdrops for you in different protocols. The more mAirdrop tokens you buy, the bigger will be your share in the airdrop distribution.
airdrop.note: NOTE: Temporarily only available for Campamento DeFi NFT Holders
airdrop.There is no mAirdrop token currently for: There is no mAirdrop token currently for sale
airdrop.Claim here your obtained airdrops. Note: Claim here your obtained airdrops. Note once your airdrop is expired, we cannot guarantee you will be able to claim it!

ramp.Move from FIAT to Crypto, or counterwise: Move from FIAT to Crypto, or counterwise
ramp.Enter the one-time code sent to your e-m: A one-time access code sent to your e-mail, please enter it to verify your identity. If you do not see it in your inbox, check your spam folder
ramp.Name: Name
ramp.Date of birth format is wrong, use YYYY-: Date of birth format is wrong, use YYYY-MM-DD
ramp.You are only allowed to make 1 transacti: You are only allowed to make 1 transaction, for less than 700€
ramp.No transactions allowed. You need to fin: No transactions allowed. You need to finish your KYC.
ramp.No transactions allowed. Please finish y: No transactions allowed. Please finish your KYC.
ramp.No transactions allowed. Please wait unt: No transactions allowed. Please wait until KYC revision is ended.
ramp.No transactions allowed. You can retry y: No transactions allowed. You can retry your KYC application.
ramp.No transactions allowed. Please contact: No transactions allowed. Please contact us at info@mucho.finance
ramp.Congratulations! You are allowed to tran: Congratulations! You are allowed to transact without limits
ramp.No transactions allowed. For further inf: No transactions allowed. For further information, contact us at info@mucho.finance
ramp.User successfully created. You can login: User successfully created. You can login now.
ramp.Could not set new target token: Could not set new target token
ramp.Could not set new target address: Could not set new target address
ramp.Could not add new bank account: Could not add new bank account
ramp.Transfer to the next account and your tr: Transfer {{amount}} {{currency}} to the next account and your transaction will be processed shortly.
ramp.Note this bank account is a virtual IBAN: Note this bank account is a virtual IBAN generated with your name, so the receptor will be yourself, funds will never be shared with other users.
ramp.Note we cannot guarantee exact exchange: Note: we cannot guarantee exact exchange amount, due to fluctuations the stablecoin price may have.
ramp.Sorry, we could not generate a bank acco: Sorry, we could not generate a bank account for your onramping. Maybe fiinishing your KYC is needed. Please contact us for more help.
ramp.Last Name Explanation: if you have 2 surnames, write both
ramp.NormalExplanation: Access to all functionalities, with standard change rates
ramp.PremiumExplanation: As NFT holder, you have access to the best change rates, with discounted fees
ramp.PremiumPendingExplanation: Your premium account is verified, but we are still processing your new fees. This could take up to 10 minutes
ramp.Already have your NFT?: Already have your NFT in a wallet? Connect and

index.hero: (mucho) Index will automatically invest for you in different protocols. By buying mIndex tokens, you are participating on the results of the portfolio.
index.note: NOTE: Temporarily only available for Campamento DeFi NFT Holders
index.There is no mIndex token currently for s: There is no mIndex token currently for sale
